title: Bought an emote and isn't working
body: Just bought Cheeky Poro emote. Tried to equip it by going to Collection > Emote Inventory. I don't see the emote that I purchased. Seems like similar problems are happening for users.

replies.body: I double checked your account and I can see that emote has been added already. If you haven't yet, try refreshing the client to see if that makes that cheeky poro pop up!
Can confirm. I had the same issue with the Braum emote. I restarted my client and it was there, but otherwise never showed in my inventory.  Thanks for posting this.
